text: Hi <@UQWGKUEN7> Thanks for reaching out, I did try to include a dnd_area within a module but it came up an error saying it wasn't allowed within this context, have you experienced this before?

For things like resources, using a single module with a repeater shows you a nice list view with the title of each resource (see here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/blog/repeating-fields-in-the-new-module-framework>). HubDB is also worth looking into as it makes it easy to migrate the data over at a later stage.

thatâ€™s perfect for a new build, but in our case, there are legacy sites with dozens of the same module on a page, and this would involve removing all the page content piece by piece and replacing it with a different module.  i would definitely do this if I built the original template.
